Tests that filter is reapplied when request is updated.

Clicked 'XHR and Fetch' button.

Request [foo] of type 'script' is hidden: true
Request [bar] of type 'script' is hidden: true

Updated request [foo] type.
Updated request [bar].

Request [foo] of type 'xhr' is hidden: false
Request [bar] of type 'script' is hidden: true
